anime_title: Shingeki no Kyojin: The Final Season Part 2
anime_title_eng: Attack on Titan: The Final Season Part 2

tags: I like the mysterious element here. Milize and Penrose got boring quick ngl. Shin is basically Levi, which was sick to see. Animation, stills and action were cracked. S2 should be better

Let's not get it twisted, the lore are the action/fight scenes, the Relics and the characters with their abilities. Other than that not too much substance - Akame was cracked. Ending was a bit strange to say the least, but not the worst I guess
Soundtrack is absolutely amazing. Other than that - Story/pacing wise seems a bit off. Good for the time I guess (Animation still holds up)
Characters are sick. 'Cyberpunk' world building is fun to explore. Starts strong, wish it kept the same consistency through the entire show (train arc till the last 3rd was weak). OP was shit.
Surprised by this one - A lot funnier and deeper in a way than I had expected. Soundtrack was very well done, and OP was really good. Really enjoyed this one, and the ending just caps it off.
Couple of pretty fun extra's :)
Nice little addition

Solid show until those last 2 piece of shit episodes where literally everyone makes some questionable decisions for no reason. Soundtrack did really well to compliment the dark theme of the show. Missed opportunity for a Room 237 at the lodge
Meh
Confusing at first but very well executed story-telling + some exciting characters
Very interesting story-telling. Did well to convey raw emotion in a heavily character driven narrative.

Stronger s2, enjoyed very much the direction it headed in. Legoshi's character progression and his overall view on life was quite refreshing and unique to see, especially in that world. Ending was a bit abrupt, but still eager for what's to come next.
THE LEGEND OF KORRA review. Good follow up to Avatar, not as good but still really fun to follow.
AVATAR: THE LAST AIRBENDER review. Goated show. Character growth and development is fantastic. Story and episode by episode narrative is so fun to follow

CASTLEVANIA review. Characters are so well developed. If the whole show was as consistently good as s3/s4 it'd be a 9. Isaac's arc is especially phenomenal. Also the animation is s4 goes absolutely dummy

Asta, Yami, Julius, Luck, Vangeance - Goats. Storyline is lit and the squads aspect is sick. Black Bulls cracked. Sometimes fights took too long and honestly this show would've been insane with better animation. Final devil battle will be crazy
What a lovely story from start to finish. Each character had meaning, and was integral to the message. Super well done!
I would say pretty average 1st season. Some villains were cool and the different quirks were pretty sick. It just hasn't really gripped me yet. Shit needs to turn up
Yessir this is exactly what I wanted to see as a follow up. Each mini arc was sick - sports festival, internships and ESPECIALLY the Hosu incident arc, and then the final exams of course
Good follow up with some insane fights in the training camp, with Deku going brazy, and then All for One vs. All Might - UNITED STATES of SMASH. Deku vs Kacchan 2 was insane

Slower paced and was kind of more like a build up season. The Overhaul + Eri arc was sick, and seeing Deku and Lemillion go all out was insane. School festival arc was a bit drawn out. Endeavor fighting was also sick to cap it off

Pace slowed down quite a bit this season but I just really enjoy the show. Training was a bit long. Deku's whips were cool. I enjoyed Hawks as a character, and the focus on villains this season was also sick to see. Tomura Shigaraki is a badman
Animation and fights were on point. Story on I-Island just wasn't that compelling and even though they tried to make it look like it was close, Deku & All Might pretty much had it easy.
anime_title: Boku no Hero Academia the Movie 1: Futari no Hero

tags: We like more action than the first film, and we especially like Deku and Kacchan fighting together, that was sick. A bit gimmicky with the transfer of OFA but it doesn't relay to the main series so all good
anime_title: Boku no Hero Academia the Movie 2: Heroes:Rising

tags: Pretty disappointed :( Very generic. Rody was a nice character and his relationship with Deku was cool. Final fights with Deku, Bakugou and Shouto were pretty sick - there just wasn't that umph there usually is. UNITED STATES of WORLD SMASH was lit
anime_title: Boku no Hero Academia the Movie 3: World Heroes' Mission

tags: What a drag to watch. Nothing got me invested. There were aspects that if developed better could get you hooked, but as it was it just wasn't very good
Very touching. Sweet and innocent short story :) Art style is very unique! OST also really matches the setting and is quite wonderful.
anime_title: Cider no You ni Kotoba ga Wakiagaru
anime_title_eng: Words Bubble Up Like Soda Pop

tags: For being an alternate story I thought they did quite well. Thoroughly enjoyed it for what it was and the ending wasn't bad either
anime_title_eng: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Re;surrection

tags: Lot of Light from Death Note vibes. All out from the start - Crazy story, plot twists and schemes
anime_title_eng: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

tags: Highest possible 8 I could give. Majority of the season was very messy but landed the ending perfectly. Noticing a lot of inspiration from Dune, which I love. Zero Requiem = The Golden Path from Dune, just on a much smaller scale
anime_title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch R2
anime_title_eng: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion R2

tags: OST was actually phenomenal here. Not every ep. was consistently great, but they were each very unique settings and situations, and the design of it all was amazing. Ep. 5 WOW! This was honestly so good

Nice. Again - nailed the action, music and had strong one-time characters that gave a little extra. Nano-tech Vincent was cool also. The whole final act of this was awesome, from the setup to the jet fights then the final showdown
This show is sticking with me. Does cliche's really well. Art style and facial expressions are on point. Good set of characters and scenarios
anime_title_eng: Daily Lives of High School Boys

tags: Yeah it was fun
First 2/3's is basically a 10. Last 3rd was still good, but leaving a bit left to be desired. Definitely felt like it could've been longer. As well as wishing Near and Mello were built up a bit more.
Score was brilliant. Pretty interesting characters. Ending - trying to achieve so much for so little in the end.
What the shit did I just watch. OST is sick. Really unique. Some pretty powerful moments/messages as well

Yeah more people gotta watch this. Perfect mix of unreal storytelling, a different gory dynamic, and fantastic comic relief. This show doesn't give a flying fuck and I'm here for it - absolutely can't wait for s2
Unapologetically ruthless. The plot and story is crazy. Some episodes were inconsistent but overall shit was wild.
Such an interesting concept done really well. Always interesting and not too many boring points in the show :)
I swear their inventions sped up 10 billion% Still enjoyable season, but small step back from 1st one

This is cracked! Animation and sound engine (especially) are so well done. Concept is fire, and not many moments really drag on, appreciate the fast pace. Characters are all pretty likeable and comic relief moments hit well. Benimaru and Burns are insane,

Season seemed to have a lot more unnecessary scenes, however they were still good and funny. Minor plot points didn't add up. Joker & Benimaru teaming up was lit. Joker's backstory was also insane. Love the vibes of the team, can't wait for s3
anime_title: Enen no Shouboutai: Ni no Shou

tags: Some moments felt a bit rushed. I liked Assassin's intro - Fights vs Lancer and Rider were cracked, so enjoyed that. Wished Toosaka had more screen time. The faster pace was definitely welcome
anime_title: Fate/stay night Movie: Heaven's Feel - I. Presage Flower
anime_title_eng: Fate/stay night: Heaven's Feel - I. Presage Flower

tags: Absolutely cracked! Shinji had it coming - Sakura going all the way was also insane. Rider vs Emiya and Archer was sick. Berserker vs Alter Saber was UNREAL. Archer saving them from Assassin and giving his arm was also sick
anime_title: Fate/stay night Movie: Heaven's Feel - II. Lost Butterfly
anime_title_eng: Fate/stay night: Heaven's Feel - II. Lost Butterfly

tags: Priest Kotomine exterminating Zouken was so badass. Emiya's Nine Lives Blade Works vs Alter Berserker was also damn hype. This version of Sakura is SICK. OST was eerie and fit well - Madoka Magica vibes. Alter Saber vs Emiya & Rider was absolutely CRACKED
anime_title: Fate/stay night Movie: Heaven's Feel - III. Spring Song
anime_title_eng: Fate/stay night: Heaven's Feel - III. Spring Song

tags: Was hoping this would be a bit more cracked, hopefully s2 brings the heat. A bit slowish at times but this holy grail war is cool, just needs to get going. Liking the Emiya & Toosaka dynamic

Ufotable are crazy. Archers vs Lancer & Emiya vs Gilgamesh & Gigalmesh vs Berserker were insane fights. 5th Holy Grail War seemed to have ended quite abruptly/easily. Was hoping for a bit more groundwork to be laid out to make the battles more meaningful
anime_title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works 2nd Season

tags: Sure.
anime_title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works 2nd Season - Sunny Day

tags: Yeah this looks like it's going to be cracked. Ufotable animation is crazy - as to be expected.
anime_title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works Prologue
anime_title_eng: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works - Prologue

tags: Fights were clean but not too cracked. There were some pretty brutal moments, moreso than UBW. New Rider is pretty sick, and seeing the opposing Kirei & Kiritsugu is also very intriguing.

Definitely held more weight that the first season. Also pretty much every character's death was brutal, which was heat. Kind of wished I watched UBW after this - just better. Rider was cool. Kiritsugu vs. Kotomine was heat. Gigalmesh was also always good
Exciting at times but overall a bit messy. Character interactions/relationships are nice and interesting to see play out

Beautiful journey from start to finish. Episodes felt too short. Characters were great, especially Mustang, but could've been more dynamic. Music was excellent, op's and endings were solid. The story throughout was just amazing
Damn, this was a lot funnier than expected. Every character had their own unique and funny relationship with each other - but Kouhei and Iori's chemistry was too good.
Pretty nice ending for everyone with some anticipation as well. LA connection was good. Singapore sky was alright. London art was meh. Tokyo vs China gang to end it was pretty sick throughout.
Goes all out right from the start. Has a story to tell and does it well. Character depth doesn't go too deep but doesn't need to - does that aspect well with what it presents. Sick show
Short. Sweet. How something can be so simple, yet so beautiful

The story, plot lines, world building and unique characters prevent this from dropping to an 8 due to some loose ends and poor pacing. However, the biggest impact I have taken from this entire medium is from Muruem and Komugi's arc. Gon's sacrifice crazy
Pretty much the pinnacle of Shounen anime. Animation is crazy, best OP I've heard yet. Characters are all unique and sick in their own way. Ep. 7 might be the coolest thing I've ever watched
Pretty messed up but also entertaining in its own way. Story is pretty cool. Genre is still a bit foreign and strange to me. 2nd season should be fun
Great animations, fantastic score. Character depth and world building is unreal - and only in 13 episodes...
Man what a ride. Art was beautiful, dialogue and development was fantastic - made it feel like the episodes weren't that long. Ending was crazy.

Got good towards the latter third. Very light-hearted and had some fun and cool animation sequences. Had a few comic relief characters that were consistent in their deliveries. Overall it was aight, didn't really care much for it
It's whatever honestly
Insanely fun story to follow. Pacing is on point! Animation and score is amazing + Ep.19

Animation and scenery are out of the world. The colors and art style is unreal. Awesome movie, enough to give more info/backstory on the different characters (hashira & kizuki). Loved the dream aspect + tanjiro's resolve is fantastic to see
anime_title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen
anime_title_eng: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Movie: Mugen Train

tags: Ufotable goated animation studio on god
anime_title_eng: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Mugen Train Arc

tags: No chance this is lower than a 9 after those fight scenes. Never seen animation that good. Tengen is too flashy. Tanjiro is cold and his next forms are sick. Zenitsu god-like speed is just the goat. Inosuke always dependable.
anime_title_eng: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Entertainment District Arc

tags: Absolutely unreal visuals, cannot understate this enough. Concept is done really well - dramatic and mystery elements really propel this movie forwards. Ending sequence is nothing short of beautiful
Good soundtrack. Not the biggest fan of the anime/art style. Shinichi and Migi's relationship is the biggest strength in this show - so so intersting
Beautiful movie. The message and struggle shown through Ishida and Nishimiya was done really hit home. Cinematography is unreal and it was visually amazing

World building and character design are second to none almost. OST seemed to continually improve as the season progressed and by the end it was beautifully put together. Anticipation was also very well executed, and from characters seen so far there weren

I mean it's hard to fault this series much considering how strong and well-written the story is. Bondrewd arc was strong and did well to progress the plot, and the Prushka account was especially touching. Pacing was a a tad bit off, but otherwise solid
anime_title: Made in Abyss Movie 3: Fukaki Tamashii no Reimei
anime_title_eng: Made in Abyss: Dawn of the Deep Soul

tags: Witches at the start were weird. OP, ED & OST were all done really well (sets each scene beautifully). Akemi's journey was especially strong. Ending wasn't exactly my cup of tea, even though it wasn't necessarily bad. Love the dynamic the Incubator brings

Weird ending, can't wait for the next one, but the rest was fantastic. Beginning was weird, but they mostly took everything good about the show and made it better here - Visuals, music, animation, focus on Homura, story-wise was very enjoyable
anime_title: Mahou Shoujo MadokaMagica Movie 3: Hangyaku no Monogatari
anime_title_eng: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie: Rebellion

tags: Can't wait for this, even though I'm very confused
anime_title_eng: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Concept Movie

tags: Such a good show to shut-down to and enjoy at face value, and watch Anos be a badass
anime_title: Maou Gakuin no Futekigousha: Shijou Saikyou no Maou no Shiso, Tensei shite Shison-tachi no Gakkou e Kayou
anime_title_eng: The Misfit of Demon King Academy

tags: I mean I get it, but it was just a bit too strange and weird for me. I liked how expressive it was in trying to show different aspects of life, and how it can go an indefinite amount of ways
Animation is super unique and so well done. Show stays consistent throughout. Most characters are fun and interesting in their own way
Stronger 2nd season. Reigen's arc was fantastic. Mob's development was so interesting to watch - very well written

Did a lot of telling and not showing at the start. Need some more from the 2nd season. Characters are likeable, and there have been some good moments throughout with magic, action and small shock factor scenes.
anime_title: Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu

tags: Yes! Got to see many more cities, towns and races. Also got a much better idea of the power dynamic and levels (especially with Orsted the Dragon God). Saw meaning and consequences which which made the journey much more powerful
anime_title: Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu Part 2

tags: Way deeper than what meets the eye. The psychological events that takes place within each character adds so much more depth to the story
Tied up a lot of what was left off in the series. Really well done, fantastic ending
anime_title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
anime_title_eng: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion

tags: Very much enjoyed the Tarantino/Aaron Sorkin'esc dialogue- writing was fantastic. Did well to hold tension and suspense, and the comedy also hit. Loved watching all the dominoes fall. Perfect ending
Badass. Love the world-building and focus on other characters to develop everything around Saitama
Too much unnecessary waffle. Garou was sick though and borderline carried this
I really don't have a clue... Some of the shots and scenes were caught well though
Beautifully written characters + their arcs are perfect! Overall meaning behind the show hits deep
First half is a bit inconsistent. Starts to shine in the 2nd half once the time reset aspect is used to a greater effect and we get some really powerful/shocking/emotional scenes
Nice back-story to Puck/Emilia - had some really good and strong moments.
anime_title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Hyouketsu no Kizuna
anime_title_eng: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- The Frozen Bond

tags: It was cute. Not for me though
anime_title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Memory Snow

tags: Enjoyed the depths this season went to explore, build upon and flesh out Subaru's character. Also the sanctuary arc is being done really well.
anime_title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu 2nd Season
anime_title_eng: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Season 2

tags: Really well done, Emilia's development is especially noteworthy and it doesn't feel rushed either.
anime_title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu 2nd Season Part 2

tags: Shit that was awesome.
Like, those last few episodes were heat, but damn this was such a mid show otherwise.

It was pretty interesting and nice to see Chihiro interact with unique and likeable characters - and how that helps her mature and forms and develops her traits through different experiences. Very much enjoyed the art style and the ost
Old and just not very good - didn't really enjoy the 'experimental' aspect of it.

Beautifully & masterfully done. 1st OP was very nice. Visuals we're amazing, OST and piano pieces were unreal (obviously). Relationships between characters were fun and for me really gave more meaning to all the events taking place
Solid opening - keeps you searching and wanting to know more. Truly the building blocks of something legendary
'I am the armoured titan'. Stronger than S1
Essential to building up everything in the background, side characters and origins
'Perfect Game' & 'Hero' - 10/10 Episodes. wow.
How they've managed to keep the pace going from S3 part 2 is unreal. Goated show
anime_title: Shingeki no Kyojin: The Final Season
anime_title_eng: Attack on Titan: The Final Season

tags: Unreal. First half was slow but necessary. What Okarin has to go through and the changes happening around that effect him, are insane to watch play out. Plot is done so well and everything seems to connect and tie into each other nicely.
After that last 3rd of the season I don't know how I could rate this lower. Insane story - much darker. Could've fixed a few pacing issues but overall this series is unreal. Kyouma came back hard af.

Enjoyable to watch, many really good moments - Basically a smaller movie version of S1, and it delivers. Does well to bring the intensifying thriller aspect back - as well as adds a nice ode to the past
anime_title: Steins;Gate Movie: Fuka Ryouiki no Dj vu
anime_title_eng: Steins;Gate: The Movie  Load Region of Dj Vu

tags: Interesting and darker take on the ending. Let's see where 0 takes us
anime_title: Steins;Gate: Kyoukaimenjou no Missing Link - Divide By Zero

tags: It was cute

Loved this concept. Sucker for music-based anime. Animation was cracked, OP and OST were damn near perfect. Literally every character was likeable and had a good overall impact. -1 for that ending tho :(
A refreshing isekai that does well to showcase how to properly do world building, power structures, a solid and level-headed mc, and build a rather enticing journey to follow
anime_title_eng: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

tags: Sound design and animation improved significantly. Story is following such an interesting path. From all the deaths to demon lord, that was all insane.
anime_title: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken 2nd Season
anime_title_eng: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Season 2

tags: Took a step back from s2 part 1. The planning stages we're a bit drawn out. Benimaru and Shion were pretty sick. Milim and Veldora's presence is refreshing. Walpurgis to setup what's coming next is hype
anime_title: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken 2nd Season Part 2
anime_title_eng: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Season 2 Part 2

tags: Story is absolute bullshit lol, but fights are sick!!! Jin Mori and Ilpyo are heat, and the kicks in fights go off. Appreciate the faster pace, bar the wedding episode. Also the noses in this show are sus.
Enjoyed most of the characters, story felt a bit disjointed at times but the general flow was fun. Last few episodes redeem this season - What's 1000 - 7?
Had a lot of potential to do so much more with the story... Won't be continuing

Yeah this story is pretty sick, some crazy moments and insane fights. It gets a bit annoying watching Takemichi cry a lot of the time, but other than that most characters are written well and fleshed out. Very excited for s2
Sick story and time frame to follow - Askeladd is fantastic

So many unbelievably sad & tragic deaths and stories. Loved the perspective of Violet understanding different emotions and empathy through all those experiences. Stunning visuals, beautiful music. Yeah what a surreal journey.
Cute but not that great
anime_title: Violet Evergarden Gaiden: Eien to Jidou Shuki Ningyou
anime_title_eng: Violet Evergarden I: Eternity and the Auto Memory Doll

tags: Fitting ending for this great story. Although the series did hit a bit harder consistently. Nevertheless very enjoyable way to cap it off on the island
Good not great. Unique setting with the opera, yet again fueled by just a sad, sad story
anime_title: Violet Evergarden: Kitto "Ai" wo Shiru Hi ga Kuru no Darou

tags: Visuals are unreal, action moments were cracked, music throughout was top tier. Did well to get you emotionally invested in the characters despite having mainly a strong focus on Vivy.
Brilliant pacing. Constant tension. Psychological horror aspect in what seems to be such a calm setting is unreal. Amazing ending!

What a fall from grace. My disappointment is immeasurable, and my day is ruined. Conflict arises and gets solved without fleshing it out. Emma's word is absolute apparently. Bad pacing, bad cgi, shocking storytelling. Can't believe we got a presentation
Super mid show. Really failed to be very engaging. Actions scenes were cool but overall failed to build on a cool story-line, and what could've been an interesting plot.
Everything S1 tried to be. Proper stakes, genuinely engaging and the story flowed well. Introduction of Mary was great. Fantastic animation and music.
anime_title_eng: Saga of Tanya the Evil: The Movie

tags: Useless, but pretty fun. Budget for this had to be close to nil though
anime_title: Youjo Senki: Sabaku no Pasta Daisakusen
anime_title_eng: Saga of Tanya the Evil: Operation Desert Pasta

tags: First couple episodes had me intrigued. Art style was cool and unique. 12 was sick. Not consistent enough per episode and some dragged. Cool idea, but execution and ending was somewhat disappointing.
